item.title: [HIVE-7774] Issues with location path for temporary external tables
item.description:

create temporary external table tmp1 (c1 string) location '/tmp/tmp1';
describe extended tmp1;
select count(*) from tmp1;

item.summary: Issues with location path for temporary external tables

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: For non-temp tables (and temp non-external tables), it looks like Warehouse.getDnsPath() is used to properly format the table location string before the location is saved. This needs to be done for temp external tables as well.
Attaching patch. Looks like MiniMR does not catch this issue for some reason, therefore I am not updating the temp_table_external test.
